title: Serhiy Petko
text:
Serhiy Yuriyovych Petko (; born 23 January 1994) is a professional Ukrainian <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Defender%20%28association%20football%29">Defender</a> who plays for <a href="NK%20Veres%20Rivne">Veres Rivne</a>.
Petko is product of youth team system of UFK Kharkiv. Made his debut for FC Chornomorets in the game against <a href="FC%20Dynamo%20Kyiv">FC Dynamo Kyiv</a> on 4 April 2015 in the <a href="Ukrainian%20Premier%20League">Ukrainian Premier League</a>.
